user_question: How do octopuses use camouflage, and can you generate an image of an octopus blending into a coral reef?
final_answer: Octopuses use specialized skin cells called chromatophores to change color and texture, allowing them to blend into their surroundings. Image of an octopus blending into a coral reef generated.
